title: Champion mastery
body:
How do u get blue essence or champion shards to highten your champ mastery?
I have the tokens.

replies.body: You can obtain blue essences through hextech crafting via opening chests.  You can also buy champion shards through the in-game store and disenchant them to blue essences.  More details are also available through our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
